attributes.title: Red vs. Blue: ZERO - Official Trailer
attributes.caption: The fate of the galaxy depends on Shatter Squad’s ragtag team of heroes. Can they keep the Ultimate Power out of evil’s hands? Watch the premiere Nov 9!
attributes.description: The fate of the galaxy depends on Shatter Squad’s ragtag team of heroes. Can they keep the Ultimate Power out of evil’s hands? Watch the premiere Nov 9!
attributes.display_title: RvBZ:E0 - Red vs. Blue: ZERO - Official Trailer

attributes.title: VIPER
attributes.caption: Before Washington can secure a strange alien artifact, a mysterious syndicate known as Viper attacks his base. Meanwhile, Shatter Squad races to pick up a new recruit.
attributes.description: Before Washington can secure a strange alien artifact, a mysterious syndicate known as Viper attacks his base. Meanwhile, Shatter Squad races to pick up a new recruit.

attributes.title: RECOVERY
attributes.caption: Carolina acquires a new team in Shatter Squad; do they have what it takes? Zero and Phase track the coordinates to an ancient temple. What lies inside? There's only one way to find out.
attributes.description: Carolina acquires a new team in Shatter Squad; do they have what it takes? Zero and Phase track the coordinates to an ancient temple. What lies inside? There's only one way to find out.

attributes.title: DUO
attributes.caption: While investigating the incident at Falcon Base, West and Raymond encounter a formidable foe. Shatter Squad prepares to go head to head with Viper.
attributes.description: While investigating the incident at Falcon Base, West and Raymond encounter a formidable foe. Shatter Squad prepares to go head to head with Viper.

attributes.title: ENCOUNTER
attributes.caption: Failing on all fronts, Shatter Squad is at odds with themselves as they reflect on their battle with Viper.
attributes.description: Failing on all fronts, Shatter Squad is at odds with themselves as they reflect on their battle with Viper.

attributes.title: SIDEWAYS
attributes.caption: Shatter Squad races to a secluded Fort Operating Base. The Mission: Protect Lavernius Tucker and prevent his sword from falling into the clutches of Viper.
attributes.description: Shatter Squad races to a secluded Fort Operating Base. The Mission: Protect Lavernius Tucker and prevent his sword from falling into the clutches of Viper.

attributes.title: SHATTERED
attributes.caption: West reveals more about his past while Shatter Squad licks their wounds. Zero gives the team one final taunt.
attributes.description: West reveals more about his past while Shatter Squad licks their wounds. Zero gives the team one final taunt.

attributes.title: FOR POWER Pt.1
attributes.caption: Zero is moments away from achieving the ultimate power! Can Shatter Squad stop him in time? The clocks ticking...
attributes.description: Zero is moments away from achieving the ultimate power! Can Shatter Squad stop him in time? The clocks ticking...

attributes.title: FOR POWER Pt.2
attributes.caption: Locked in the deadliest fight of their lives, does Shatter Squad have what it takes to save the fate of the World?
attributes.description: Locked in the deadliest fight of their lives, does Shatter Squad have what it takes to save the fate of the World?
